original_title: 上司NTR【専属女優スペシャル!】～パワハラ上司が愛妻に完堕ちするまで中出し編～
overview: I miraculously married Aika, who was a local station announcer. Aika retired and she became a housewife. One day, bosses who want to come to play at home. I don't like it because it's glaring, but I don't want to worsen my position in the company. The boss who brings his wife into the bedroom saying "I have a talk with your wife." Meanwhile, another boss continues to preach to me. The occasional creaky sound of the bed... At a later date, I was forced to work overtime due to an unusual amount of work. Meanwhile, the boss calls his wife to the hotel again...
title: Boss NTR [An Exclusive Actress Special!] A Power Harassing Boss Is having Creampie Sex With My Beloved Wife Until She Falls For Him Aika Yamagishi
